original_title: LAUGFS Rubber recognized as Runner-Up in the Export Sector category at NBEA awards ceremony
original_body_lines: LAUGFS Rubber, announces that it has been honoured as the Runner-Up in the Export Sector category at the National Business Excellence Awards (NBEA) 2023, organised by the National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka (NCCSL), a highly regarded platform that acknowledges exceptional business performances and recognises organisations for their contribution to the country’s economic progress.

Upon receiving the award, LAUGFS Rubber Chief Executive Officer, Chinthaka Wegapitiya, expressed his gratitude, stating, “We would like to extend our heartfelt appreciation to NCCSL. It is more than a pleasure to be recognized as the Runner Up in the Export Sector category at the National Business Excellence Awards 2023. This achievement would not have been possible without our exceptional team’s dedication and collective effort, whose passion and expertise drive our success. As we move forward, we remain committed to upholding our position as a leading exporter, delivering superior products and solutions, fostering innovation, and striving for excellence in everything we do.”

As a trusted and reliable partner for international customers seeking high-quality tyres, LAUGFS Rubber’s export performance not only contributes to its own growth but also plays a pivotal role in promoting the rubber industry of Sri Lanka on the international stage. This achievement highlights LAUGFS Rubber’s commitment to excellence and its strong focus on innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction. For instance, LAUGFS Rubber recently opened a rubber collection center where rubber farmers can sell their produce directly without the involvement of a 3rd party.

LAUGFS Rubber, a subsidiary of LAUGFS Holdings, operates with a specialized focus on industrial tyres, exporting to customers in over 40 countries. Venturing further into international waters, LAUGFS Rubber also operates two subsidiaries; one in the United States (LAUGFS USA LLC) and the other in Europe (LAUGFS EUROPE B.V). Functioning at high capacity, both companies are equipped with warehouses and distribution points, effectively catering to the growing demand across the regions.

In line with international best practices, the company boasts a state-of-the-art, environmentally friendly manufacturing facility, which generates 40% of its energy requirement through solar panels. This facility uses the finest rubber compounds and the globally recognized Total Quality Management (TQM) processes to produce REACH-compliant, solid tires of international standards. Given its strong commitment to quality and environmentally sound manufacturing practices, the Company has received the ISO 9001-2015 certification for policy management, ISO 50001-2011 certification for energy management, and ISO 14001-2015 for environment management.
